page.title: 15GRANGELAND PARK ESTATE
page.content: We carried out a survey of the reisdents of Grangeland Park housing estate to find out where they had come from and if they had moved because of their job. We interviewed 236 householders, 41% had moved from within Congleton, 27% from within 20 miles and 32% from over 20 miles away. Agood number of the 41% who moved from within Congleton had moved here originally because of their jobs but to a different part of Congleton, mainly the West Heath area. Overall 42% of the residents on the estate had moved because of a job and 58% had not. Here are some examples of the companies which people had moved to: I.C.I. (11), Siemens (6), I.C.L. (5), G.E.C. and Ciba-Geigy (2) each.
